Title: Luka Doncic's Buzzer Beater Gives Mavericks Win vs. Jayson Tatum, Celtics
Description: Luka Doncic nailed a game-winning, step-back three-pointer with one-tenth of a second left as the Dallas Mavericks earned a 110-107 home win over the Boston Celtics on Tuesday at American Airlines
Author: Bleacher Report
